description:
500 + students in the first week!

30 Day Udemy money back guarantee.

----Recently added - background eraser tool lesson----

This course will start of with an indepth look and application of Photoshop's fundamental selection techniques and then move on to more advanced methods.

Giving you what you need to make quick and advanced selections

We will start of with some tips on creating basic manual selections, using lasso, marque quick masks and Photoshop's pen tools.

Then looking at Photoshop's built in selection methods, such as colour selection, quick select and magic wand.

Finally we will apply some advanced selection methods using channels, refine edge tools and and brushes to select intricate details and furry and fluffy subjects.

I also offer a 30 day money back guarantee if not entirely satisfied.

All future updates for free.

And coupons to future lessons!!!

+++++++ Start your journey on becoming a Photoshop wizard!!! +++++
title: Learn Advanced Photoshop Selections
